Text: Thanks for this, I didn't know about this character.  Are there any other appearances in any other comics that you know of w/ blue marvel?

Blue Marvel was also in Age of Heroes #3 (2010), Fear Itself: The Home Front #4 (2011) has a seven page short story title "Legacy", and a different version of him appears in the one-shot What If? Secret Invasion (2010) - I haven't read this one, though.
